titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry star Mel Tillis at the Waycross City Auditorium

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the Glen Campbell Show and Grand Ole Opry star Mel Tillis with Larry Lee and the Statesiders at the Waycross City Auditorium on May 25. Poster features metal photoplates of Mel Tillis.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
